title: Spear of Shojin has to go.  Its too OP on a few Champs
body:
It has too much that champs like {{champion:92}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:23}} want.

Its the perfect item for them and makes them basically unkillable.

The passive on it needs to go.

replies.body:
So why not...Nerf the item?

You can nerf something without deleting it. It's entirely possible.
ya the passive needs to be removed.  Its too OP on CD champs
you're late to the train. they already are removing it come next patch.
why would trynd use spear of shojin?
It doesn't need to go, it just needs to be changed into it's Nexus Blitz version, where it was a defensive item.
Won't happen, Riven is Riot's top lane baby. Even if they remove the item they'll give her significant buffs to make up for it because 'muh skillcap'.
or you know... nerf the champions? nerf the stats on the item? love that the first thing people go to is "delete this" every single time there is something they don't like
how about delete those champs and we gucci

The passive is identical to old{{item:3508}} .

What makes this item so good for bruisers is that it now gives HP and loses the mana gain that they don't need and makes for an extremely gold-efficient item.

The passive is not the problem. The HP is the problem and how gold efficient this item is which makes an extraordinarily attractive purchase
